channel.title: How do I change the Buy X amount of items in shops [PI]
channel.description:
[PI SERVER]
I just need to know what side I change the buy 1, 5, 10, etc. The labels, not the amounts you can buy.
So basically what you see when you right click the item you want to buy (Ex. Buy 1, Buy 5, Buy 10)
Thanks for anyones input!!
